task.title: Opening the Port Doors
task.shortdesc: How to open the port doors and their locations.

context.p: The term "port" as used in this manual refers to the openings into which the Cable connectors are inserted to provide an interconnection between the and the modules. The ports, with the exception of the port, are also covered by removable Doors.

step.cmd: To remove these Doors, press on the right side of the Door and it will pivot slightly.
Grasp the left side of the Door and pull out (see the following figure for locations).
